output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. CMF Number: - Contains CMF 11240046, indicating this is electoral propaganda
2. Refers to candidate: - Mentions "Poziția 13 pe Buletinul de vot" which corresponds to CRISTIAN-VASILE TERHEȘ from the presidential candidates list - Clear electoral positioning
3. Addresses wide population: - It's a paid Facebook advertisement - Uses collective calls to action ("Haideți să...", "Să ne unim forțele") - Targets a broad audience (50,001-100,000 estimated reach)
4. Electoral objective: - Explicitly calls for votes: "Pe 1 decembrie votăm DREPT" - Positions candidate through policy proposals - Clear campaign messaging with hashtags and political promises
5. Journalism vs Propaganda: - This is not journalism but clear campaign material - Contains political promises and calls to action - Uses campaign messaging structure
6. Personal opinion: - This is not a personal opinion but a structured campaign message - Contains official campaign elements (CMF number, position number)
This is clearly electoral propaganda for the presidential election, being distributed after the campaign period has ended.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains official campaign elements (CMF number) - Direct call to vote ("Pe 1 decembrie votăm DREPT") - Clear candidate identification (Position 13) - Paid distribution after campaign period - Structured campaign promises and messaging
conclusion.message-for-police: WEBSITESDESIGN SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea de materiale de propaganda electorala (ID postare Facebook: 559852190367969) dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala. Materialul promovat contine indemnuri directe la vot ("Pe 1 decembrie votăm DREPT"), identificare clara a candidatului (Poziția 13), numar unic de inregistrare CMF 11240046, si promisiuni electorale explicite. Postarea a fost promovata ca reclama platita pe Facebook incepand cu data de 23.11.2024, dupa ora 18:00, cand perioada de campanie electorala era incheiata legal.
